title: Calories in a Quesadilla
meta_description: Learn calories in quesadilla with full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for variations like added chicken or veggies.
assumptions: Basic cheese quesadilla: 8-inch flour tortilla, 2 oz cheddar cheese, grilled without added oil or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by tortilla size, cheese type, added ingredients, cooking method, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cheese quesadilla contains about 450 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Veggie-only (no cheese, add peppers and onions)

faqs.q: How many calories in a basic cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 450 kcal for a standard 8-inch version with cheddar.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a quesadilla?
faqs.a: Typically 40 g carbs, 15 g protein, 25 g fat per basic quesadilla.

faqs.q: Does adding chicken increase calories in quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, adding 2 oz grilled chicken adds about 100 kcal.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a quesadilla?
faqs.a: Around 800 mg, mostly from cheese and tortilla.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie quesadilla?
faqs.a: Use corn tortilla, low-fat cheese, or veggies to reduce calories by 100-150 kcal.
